name: Asmodat BF4 Suicide Switch & Center Dot
short_description:
Remember to run it as administrator !


Changelog version 1.4.1:
-Optional  mouse cursor hiding in red dot mode for recording purposes.

Changelog version 1.4: 
-Keep real time process priority for BF4.exe ! (better in game performance)
-Center Red Dot for hardcore mode
-Optional suecide

This program allow you to suicide in Battlefield 4 with one click.

Piss off your enemies !!!

Might require .NET Framework 4.5 

Press F10 to activate / deactivate 
Then middle mouse button in game to kill yourself. 

(Works only in multiplayer mode.)

If you checked Mouse as pad option and you have
mouse with 6 buttons, then you can use your fifth 
and sixth buttons (back and forward button) 
to turn left and right with specified speed.

If you like any of my mods/tools,
you can easly donate me through
paypal: asmodat@gmail.com
